comments: I will never forget Professor Li because I learned everything I know or remember from him. I\'ve used all that he has taught me time and time again. I can still hear that southern accent repeating and repeating the same thing over and over again. Thanks Professor Li. You made me get my monies worth from CSUF

It was a very hard class. But, I have to admit that Prof. Li was one of the best teachers that I have ever had... no matter what other people say... he motivated his students to not only memorize stuff but actually LEARN :)People don\'t like him, because they wanted him to pass them without putting any efforts... Wish you the best Prof. Li

Probably the hardest class I have taken. But all his toughness paid off in the end when I studied. You need to show up, take notes, and study. Very possible to pass. He\'s retired though so nothing more to say.

ACCT 201A - Financial Accounting. Not much to say anymore, he retired at the end of Fall 09 semester. He is tough but he just wants every one to be as good an accountant as he is. He doesn\'t deserve all the criticism from other commenters. Do the reading, there are no shortcuts in accounting (and life). Enjoy retirement Prof. Li.
It is possible to pass his class. You have to read and study. I\'d recommend him though, I like his style. Everybody who is complaining sounds lazy.

Thinks he is the biggest BA in the world...will constantly hear him say "Read your notes ladies and gentlemen." Makes you feel dumb when asking questions...Don\'t take him if your trying to keep your GPA up...
Worth Professor Ever, he is cocky and think he is the smartest person in the world just bcuz he knos accounting. He is not a good teacher at all and he enjoy to fail ppl! Useless teacher!

The worst teacher ever, He loves to give F\'s and he hates people. He makes you read the Wall Street Journal, and is is on the exams. The only way to get a B in the class is to take the class twice. DO NOT DO THAT TO YOURSELF! STAY AWAY FROM HIM!!!

He truly is challenging but hey, it\'s college & he gets you prepared for even harder classes in the future. I really like his lectures. STUDY THE WORKBOOK! It REALLY helps & use the website from the book. The questions on practice quiz/test are on the final. You really have to know the material. Got a C.

He was 30 mins late the 1st day of class was completely pissed off that he has to teach. He basically said you can\'t get anything better than a C even with the curve. Out of 215 studenst last semester he gave 1 A!! DONT TAKE HIM!!!

incredibly tough teacher. Test are really really hard. every question has all of the above and none of the above. you have to read the chapter before the class, and respond in class, and if the rest of the class doesnt respond, then he gets really mean. good luck, i got my first C in this class.

It is true that he challenges you as a student. He is actually entertaining and I enjoyed his sarcasm. Just pay attention in class and follow directions. When he tells you to stop answering questions - stop and you\'ll do fine. I pulled a B because of his curve. Very fair.

this prof is the hardest prof i have ever had. He always complains about class participation even though the class is participating. Hes the kind of professor that on tests will put a none of the above or two of the above on every question. We all read his profile on here and didnt think it was he was that bad... he is as bad as it says on here.

Mr. Li is hates life so he takes it out on his students. he gets off by failing students. hard teacher. avoid this class! I went into the final passing, which is hard in the first place, then took the final and it was NOTHING like the way he taught accounting because its a department final. so it screwed me

This guy is terrible b/c his notes are illegible, he doesnt use black board and his tests are rediculasly difficult. You must get a perfect score on hw, in class assignments, and quizes in order to get a chance at the extra credit. His grading system is unclear, he threatens u with pop quizes all the time (perfect score req on it for xtra cred)

Alright this guy is by far the worst teacher I have ever had. I\'m only writing a review on here to help those thinking about taking him. DO NOT!!! Test are extremely difficult, threatens you with pop quizzes everyday, goes through the subject matter very quickly, and makes you feel stupid if you ask a question in the class. Take at a JC.

Hands down. Worst teacher I have ever taken in my entire college career. Because of him, I\'m changing majors. Screw Business and especially accounting. Seems to me that the only ppl who get acct are acct majors or people who just love acct! Tests are incredibly difficult and final is easier supposedly? Good luck with him.
worst teacher ever! if you like teaching yourself then take him otherwise stay away from him. He is not a full time teacher and it shows
Someone should tell Li to stop teaching. NO JOKE

This teacher is tough. My best advice is to take this if you like a challenge. otherwise, i suggest taking it at a JC. I have a midterm next week and he allowed us to read the previous midterm forms. I\'ll also pay $$$ for the old midterm.
